meanings: (상황에 맞게 맞춤) adjustment, modification, revision, adjust, fine-tune, modify, revise, (시간·일정 등을) rearrange
(분쟁 등을 해결함) mediation, arbitration, conciliation, mediate, arbitrate, conciliate
(임금과 신하가 나라의 정치를 논하던 곳) (Royal) Court

vlive.korean: [조명도 키고 화면 조정 중] 켠 게 더 나은... [Adjusting light and focus] I think this is better... 듣기 View video Dispatch : [ⓓxV] “옴-LOG③ #지호_비니_아린” (오마이걸 : OHMYGIRL)
vlive.english: [Adjusting light and focus] I think this is better...

vlive.korean: 왜, 왜? - 위치 조정하는 거지? What's wrong? - You're putting them at a different place? 듣기 View video VICTON : 레몬2🐥🐶🍋
vlive.english: What's wrong? - You're putting them at a different place?

vlive.korean: [마지막에서야 나온 자리 이동 카드] "마음대로 자리 조정하기 "근데 마지막 카드인데? [As the last card] "Change the seating". This is the last one? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 속마음을 전달할 수 있는 마지막 기회 #썸파티ㅣ[리얼하이로맨스S2] EP18

vlive.english: And you can remote control with your phone and has patrol function. - Patrol?
